data.text: Neuru koro Ruoth Nyasaye,
thuondi maroteke kod jolweny,
jatend lweny morito ji piero abich gi joma ogen,
Anaket mana yawuowi obed jotendgi,
Ji nosandre kendgi giwegi,
Ngʼato nochun achiel kuom owetene
To e kindeno ngʼatno nodwoki niya,
Jerusalem yiengni,
Wangʼ-gi nyiso ni gin joricho
Kone joma kare ni gin johawi,
Yaye, mano kaka nobed malit ne joricho nikech masira nobed kuomgi.
Jomatindo ema thiro joga
Jehova Nyasaye osebedo e kom bura
Sa ngʼado bura mar Jehova Nyasaye
En angʼo momiyo usando
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya,
Kuom mano Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelo adhonde ewi mond Sayun,
Odiechiengʼno Ruoth Nyasaye biro mayogi gik ma gilichorego kaka: bangli gi kitembini mag wich kod tigo mag ngʼut,
gi tigo miliero e it gi bangli mag lwetgi kod kitamba miliero e ngʼut,
gi kitembini mag wich, gi thiwni mag ofunj tielo, gi misip gi chupni motingʼo gik mangʼwe ngʼar kod ris,
gi tere mag lwedo gi mag um,
lewni mayom gi kode gi mifuke mag lwedo,
kod kio, gi lewni mabeyo gi lewni miliero e ngʼut kod mago miumogo wangʼ.
Kar winjo tik mangʼwe ngʼar to unuwinj mana tik madungʼ marach;
Chwou notiek gi ligangla
Nduru gi ywak mag dengo nopongʼ dhorongeye mag Sayun,
